text: Robert McElhenney III (born April 14, 1977) is an American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. He is known for his role as Mac on the FX/FXX comedy series It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia. McElhenney is also known for his ownership of Wrexham A.F.C., a Welsh soccer club that plays in the English league system. He and fellow actor Ryan Reynolds purchased the club in 2021. Their ownership is the subject of the documentary TV series Welcome to Wrexham, which is currently broadcast in the U.S. on FX. == References == Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American television directors Category:American Roman Catholics Category:American television writers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television producers Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:Screenwriters from Pennsylvania
title: Rob McElhenney
